name: Leader Of Combines
description:
Instructions:

-SPACE to plant

-F to interact

-Collect crops by running them over

-Deposit produce by driving in front of store

-Sell by clicking coin icon above store

-More instructions in game

Objective:

-Get 1 Radish Seed in the fastest manner possible

ComedE:

Look, I did what EVERYBODY was thinking. I made a speedrunnable FARMING SIMULATOR. I know, I know, no need to thank me just yet. Wait till you see how overboard I went with the Post Processing. Fun for the whole family. All for the amazing price of FREE!!!!!
